definition: هضم haḍama i (haḍm) to digest (هـ the food; of the stomach); to oppress, terrorize, outrage, wrong, treat with injustice (ه s.o.); to stand, bear, endure (ه s.o.); to stomach (هـ s.th.), put up with s.th. (هـ) VII to be digested VIII to oppress, wrong (ه s.o.), do (ه s.o.) an injustice هضم haḍm digestion; patience, long-suffering │ هضم الجانب forbearance, compliance, indulgence; سهل الهضم sahl al-h. easily digestible, light
